about_the_game: The Citroën DS3 RX is a powerful monster. It combines power with incredible agility, letting you negotiate bends at blistering speeds. It takes heart and passion to tame this war machine. V-Rally Cross fans will love its extraordinary grip on both asphalt and dirt.
detailed_description: The Citroën DS3 RX is a powerful monster. It combines power with incredible agility, letting you negotiate bends at blistering speeds. It takes heart and passion to tame this war machine. V-Rally Cross fans will love its extraordinary grip on both asphalt and dirt.
legal_notice: ©2018 Published by Bigben Interactive and developed by KT Racing. Manufacturers, vehicles, names, brands and associated imagery featured in this game are trademarks and/or copyrighted materials of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Warning: This is a virtual game and not real life. Be cautious, do not imitate the vehicle movements shown in this game when you are driving a car in real life. Remember: drive safely!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: The Citroën DS3 RX is a powerful monster. It combines power with incredible agility, letting you negotiate bends at blistering speeds. It takes heart and passion to tame this war machine. V-Rally Cross fans will love its extraordinary grip on both asphalt and dirt.
